title: Drawing, 1969-165-382, 1961
medium: Pen and black ink, graphite on heavy white tracing paper
signed: In graphite lower right: A.H. Girard - Feb.14, 1961
inscribed: In graphite across lower edge: "quardispot" - four times actual size; Verso: in graphite upper left corner: IV - 6
provenance: This collection was donated to the Cooper-Hewitt, National Design Museum in 1969 by Alexander Girard
description: Pattern of four small black dots arranged in a vertical diamond shape
